text: Oh great, another plot twist we saw coming from a mile away.
Wow, that plot twist completely surprised me.
I just love it when characters act completely illogical.
I really enjoyed how the characters’ choices made sense and felt real.
Yeah, I totally needed another 30 minutes of small talk.
The conversations really helped me understand the characters better.
Absolutely loved the ending—so satisfying… not.
Absolutely loved the ending; it wrapped everything up nicely.
The soundtrack was… something, I guess.
The soundtrack was excellent and really added to the mood.
I appreciated the dialogue… even when it made no sense.
I appreciated the dialogue; it was natural and engaging.
Oh, the suspense was intense… for about a minute.
Oh, the suspense kept me on the edge of my seat the whole time.
I love when villains explain everything in one line… thrilling.
I love how the villain’s hints made the story more intriguing.
Sure, the cinematography was… okay.
Sure, the cinematography was beautiful and really stood out.
That chase scene really moved at the speed of… well, not much.
That chase scene was fast-paced and exciting.
I couldn’t stop laughing at how ‘funny’ that joke was.
I couldn’t stop laughing at the clever jokes throughout.
Yes, another monologue about nothing important… love it.
Yes, the monologue revealed key details about the character.
The character chemistry was… interesting, if you like awkwardness.
The character chemistry was fantastic and believable.
Reflective scenes that add so much emotion… really not.
Reflective scenes added real emotional depth.
I loved the suspense, especially during the boring parts.
I loved the suspense; it kept me engaged the entire time.
Plot development was so subtle I didn’t notice it exist.
Plot development was subtle, but effective and satisfying.
Dialogue made me feel something… mostly confusion.
Dialogue made me feel something; it was heartfelt and moving.
A masterpiece… if by masterpiece you mean forgettable.
A masterpiece; the storytelling was excellent.
Inspirational speech about nothing… wow.
Inspirational speech added meaning and depth to the story.
I connected with the protagonist… in a totally useless way.
I connected with the protagonist; their journey was inspiring.
The villain was terrifying… in the most boring way.
The villain was terrifying; I was genuinely on edge.
Emotional depth… like a puddle.
Emotional depth was excellent; I felt truly moved.
Action scenes were thrilling… if you like slow walking.
Action scenes were thrilling; I was excited throughout.
Pacing was perfect… perfectly boring.
Pacing was perfect; the story flowed naturally.
I loved the twists… totally obvious.
I loved the twists; I couldn’t guess what would happen next.
Ending was satisfying… satisfied it was finally over.
Ending was satisfying; it resolved everything nicely.
Symbolism… symbolic of nothing.
Symbolism was clever and added real meaning.
The story kept me guessing… mostly why I watched it.
The story kept me guessing; I was excited to see what happens next.
Dialogue was witty… more like cringey.
Dialogue was witty and clever throughout the film.
I adored the character arcs… arcs that went nowhere.
I adored the character arcs; every journey felt meaningful.
